title: Rust Enum Usage Examples
description: In this lab, we have a C-like example in Rust that demonstrates how to use enum as C-like enums, including enums with implicit and explicit discriminators.

meta.title: Rust Enum Usage Examples: Mastering C-like Enums
meta.description: Explore the power of Rust's enum feature with C-like enum examples, including implicit and explicit discriminators.
